desc: Elite performance running sandals - for running, sports, hiking, camping, ultralight backpacking, travel, and of course, relaxing! Even if you're not a barefoot runner or minimalist, this is a new kind of sandal that you don't want to miss out on. No slipping, secure lacing. Made in USA ★ Free Shipping

layout.text:
GET FREE POWER STRAPS WITH ADULT ELITE LE SANDALS, FOR A VERY LIMITED TIME!
JUST ADD POWER STRAPS AND SANDALS TO YOUR CART, AND USE CODE POWERFULSUMMER AT CHECKOUT!
